title: Diversity and Inclusion on Wall Street
description: Financial News' Penny Sukhraj discusses privilege on Wall Street with Bank of America's Ebony A. Thomas and author J. Derek Penn, and what it might take to effect change and why inclusivity matters to investors.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
